But right now, it's just a blessing to be around here. Better late than never. Rajon Rondo scored 28 points with 11 assists and eight rebounds, and Kendrick Perkins had 16 points, 19 rebounds and seven blocks for Boston. The Celtics could finish the Bulls off in Chicago on Thursday in Game 6;

Thaddeus Young was sensational, using an 11-of-15 effort in the first half to give the Sixers a rare comfortable lead and easy win. It's been working for us, but we just couldn't get the win, Thaddeus Young said.`` It really worked tonight.'' ... It just[ felt] negative.'' The` Just Go With It' star was referring to past seasons that included the outspoken Simon Cowell at the judges' table. Oprah Winfrey defended him, saying, I'm a Simon Cowell fan and what I thought is that Simon Cowell had a way of speaking the truth that was saying what you wanted to say but you wouldn't actually say it. She added,`` I will say that it's a kinder, gentler[ show now.]''
